title: The Latest On The UW System's Wisconsin Idea Controversy
teaser: Gov. Scott Walker is blaming the drastic changes to the UW System’s mission on a “simple miscommunication” with his budget staff, and that the Wisconsin Idea will remain intact. Joy Cardin’s guest, who broke the original story , discusses ongoing developments, including revelations that the Walker administration sought removal of the Wisconsin Idea.
